summary: Make the Bards sing your Tunes by adding your favourite songs to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[heading]
[center]
[b]
Make the Bards sing to your Tunes by adding your favourite songs to Skyrim.
[/b]
[/center]
[/heading]


My Bard Songs allows user to add their own custom songs to Skyrim.

You hired the Bard at your Lakeview Manor, so why shouldn't he/she play your tunes instead ? Or ever wanted to listen to your fav Track after hours of digging Dungeons full of creepy Draugrs..??

You can now, with the help of this simple mod which lets you add your own tracks into Skyrim.
The CTD issue is Fixed now, so hopefully it will run smooth now. Also if you are lucky Bards will do Lipsing too a bit (check video).

:)

Enjoy...!!

[heading]
[b]
Installation :
[/b]
[/heading]
1) Use NMM to install the MOD.

2) Then go to your Data folder in Skyrim Directory, it should be :
C:Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/

3) Then search for a folder name Sound and navigate to :
Sound/voice/skyrim.esm

4) You'll find 4 more folders in which you can drop your songs in .wav format.
Follow the instructions in the Text file present in those folders to know which song will be replaced in Skyrim.

5) For the Songs to work you need to rename your files to the exact same name of the Text file.
Also all song files should be in 16 bit pcm .wav format. Use Audacity.

:)
